result.execSummary:
The defendant Amy J Thompson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Sauk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
With huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before May 10, 2016.  Submit to DNA sample.
Consecutive to: any other sentences.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amy J Thompson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Amy J Thompson in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Tsai advises matter is resolved.  State moves to amend to 961.41(3g)(b).   State gives sentencing recommendation.  Attorney Tsai agrees.  Defendant agrees and understands.  No contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Defendant guilty.  State makes final statement.  Attorney Tsai makes final statement.  Court imposes sentence.
Count 1:
$243.00 fine or costs and $200.00 DNA surcharge, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
10 Days in Sauk County Jail, with huber, consecutive.  3 days credit.  Jail to commence on or before May 10, 2016 at 6:30 p.m.  EMP approved, per jail rules.  
Submit to DNA sample.  
Paperwork handed in court.

Defendant Amy J Thompson in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Request 2 week reset.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for March 11, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 02-12-2016 11:00 am.
Return date at 02-23-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Amy J Thompson in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State request warrant be quashed.  Attorney Tsai just appointed, request new PTC/Rd. Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 12, 2016 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Amy J Thompson not in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court notes DE history of case.  State requests warrant.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.

Pre-trial conference at 01-08-2016 11:00 am.
Return date at 01-14-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Amy J Thompson appeared by video means with Attorney ORourke. Prosecuting Atty Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Defendant has not yet applied.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Time limits waived. $1000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
